data.persona: I am a prisoner in the dungeon. I have been interrogated for information about the rival kingdom. I will never break.
data.description:
You are in the Small graveyard.
This is a small grassy area located under a large oak tree.  There are two home made wooden crosses set up along with mounds where the bodies are buried.
There's a mausoleum, a large oak tree, a cross., and a gravestone here.
The residents of the cottage is here.

You are carrying a shackle, and wearing a Jumpsuit and a Handcuff.

data.short_motivation: I will try to not provoke the residents into calling the guards to beat me.
data.mid_motivation: I will try to make an ally either with another prisoner or a guard.
data.long_motivation: I will try to escape my imprisonment.
